Xilisoft DivX to DVD Converter is fast and easy-to-use DVD burning software which convert DivX to DVD, XviD to DVD, and burn DivX to DVD, burn XviD to DVD disc playable on portable/home DVD player. 

Xilisoft DivX to DVD Converter allows you to specify NTSC or PAL video format, adjust 4:3 or 16:9 video aspect, and burn either DVD disc, DVD folder or ISO file. The DivX to DVD converter also provides so many brilliant DVD menus for your DivX to DVD conversion. It supports DVD-R, DVD+R, DVD-RW, DVD+RW and DVD-5, DVD-9.

So easy and fast than ever before, just one click to convert DivX to DVD!
